sections.heading: Game Overview
sections.content: This is a cooperative game where investigators explore a mansion and solve mysteries. Players work together to complete objectives before time runs out.

sections.heading: Setup Phase
sections.content:
Each player chooses an investigator and receives their character card.

Place the map tiles according to the scenario guide.

Shuffle the common item deck and place it within reach of all players.

sections.heading: Items and Equipment
sections.content:
An investigator can carry any number of common items. However, an investigator can have only two possessions.

When an investigator gains a possession, if he already has two possessions, he must discard one possession to the supply.

sections.heading: Combat Rules
sections.content:
To attack a monster, roll dice equal to your strength value.

Each evade result allows you to move one space away from the monster.

Each damage result deals one damage to the monster.

sections.heading: Victory Conditions
sections.content:
Investigators win by completing all objectives before the timer runs out.

If the timer reaches zero or all investigators are eliminated, the investigators lose the game.
